com.unvired.lib.utility

Class BusinessEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.unvired.lib.utility.BusinessEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BusinessEntity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    BusinessEntity is a utility class that provides an object oriented view of any Business Object (Sales Order, Invoice, Business Partner etc) It is based on the premise that every entity in this world can be represented in a simple hierarchical relationship consisting of a single header and related items.

    Header(1...1)
    ---Item(0...n)

    In database terminology is it equivalent to a single primary table with its dependent foreign tables.

    The header or item themselves are a collection of key value pairs (Field Name, Field Value) and are abstracted using the Structure object A Business Entity has the following properties:
    1. Name - Unique ID used to identify one Business entity from another
    2. Version - Number used to indicate different version of the same Business Entity
    3. Action - A code used to indicate how a client is to interpret this Business Entity. It can have one of three values (0 - Add, 1 - Delete, 2 - Update)
    4. Header - A Structure with (key,value) pairs describing the properties of the header
    5. Items - A list of Structure each with its set of (key,value) pairs describing the properties of individual items. A Structure object has a name that is used to differentiate between types of items.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
